# Player

class Player

The Player class.

Properties Methods
node play
options setVolume
guild setEQ
textChannel setTrackRepeat
voiceChannel setQueueRepeat
bands stop
queue pause
playing seek
position
volume
trackRepeat
queueRepeat

# Properties:

  • # node

The players node.
Type: Node

  • # options

The players options.
Type: IPlayerOptions

  • # guild

The players guild it's connected to.
Type: Guild

  • # textChannel

The players text channel it's connected to.
Type: TextChannel

  • # voiceChannel

The players voice channel it's connected to.
Type: VoiceChannel

  • # bands

The players equalizer bands.
Type: Array<IEqualizerBand>

  • # queue

The players queue.
Type: Queue

  • # playing

Whether the player is playing.
Type: boolean

  • # position

The players current position in the track.
Type: number

  • # volume

The players current volume.
Type: number

  • # trackRepeat

Whether the player is repeating the current track.
Type: boolean

  • # queueRepeat

Whether the player is repeating the queue.
Type: boolean

# Methods:

  • # play

Plays the next track in the queue.

  • # setVolume

Sets the players volume.

Parameter Type Description
volume number The volume to set.

  • # setEQ

Sets the players equalizer. Pass a empty array to reset the bands.

Parameter Type Description
bands Array<EqualizerBand> The array of bands to set.

# Example:

player.setEQ([
     { band: 0, gain: 0.15 },
     { band: 1, gain: 0.15 },
     { band: 2, gain: 0.15 }
]);

â€‹

  • # setTrackRepeat

Sets the track repeat.

Parameter Type Description
repeat boolean If track repeat should be enabled.

  • # setQueueRepeat

Sets the queue repeat.

Parameter Type Description
repeat boolean If queue repeat should be enabled.

  • # stop

Stops the current track.

  • # pause

Pauses the current track.

Parameter Type Description
pause boolean Whether to pause the current track.

  • # seek

Seeks to the position in the current track.

Parameter Type Description
pause boolean Whether to pause the current track.
